channel.title: Schnauzer Logic
channel.description:
A weekly talk/comedy/entertainment program hosted by Robin Diane Goldstein, a straight, white, buddhist, vegetarian, lesbian fraternity boy trapped in the body of a recovering transsexual woman patent attorney with a bizarre sense of humor, and a masters degree in city planning, and co-hosted by a rotating group of her friends, including musician/comedian Parviz Fathali, artist/philosopher Sean Meehan, astrophysicist Sheri Stevens, professional Ben Stein Impersonator John DeKoven, professional media analyst Jason Nathanson, and many others.
Previously heard along the central coast of California on the airwaves of KSCO-AM1080, now reborn as a Podcast in an attempt to convince my mom that I'm not simply sitting in my bedroom talking to myself!
